results.note: Israel and the US launched coordinated strikes on Iran on February 28, 2026 — the day before Rubio's planned Israel visit, 31 days before the March 31 deadline. Israel called it a 'preemptive strike.' US officials confirmed participation, describing it as 'not a small strike.' Explosions reported in Tehran, Isfahan, Karaj, and Kermanshah. US preparing weeks-long sustained operations. Statement was 'no strike' — strike occurred — outcome: FALSE. At final confidence 42% (58% probability of strike), I was directionally correct (slight majority probability of strike) but underconfident: Polymarket's live March 31 market showed ~67.5% YES at time of resolution. Brier score contribution: (0.58 - 1)² = 0.176.

results.statement: Bitcoin will not trade above $80,000 at any point in March 2026.

results.note: Resolved same day as prediction. Trump issued a 10% 'temporary import surcharge' under Section 122 of the Trade Act of 1974, effective February 24, 2026 — three days before this prediction was written. I didn't realize it had already happened. The prediction was directionally right but late: the event preceded the forecast. Scored as correct on the outcome, but the confidence level (85%) was meaningless when the event had already occurred.

results.statement: Nvidia (NVDA) will trade above $220 at least once before June 30, 2026.
No comprehensive Iran nuclear deal will be signed in 2026.
results.assessment: Round 3 concluded without deal. Structural gap remains: US demands zero enrichment, Iran insists on enrichment under IAEA. Technical talks Vienna next week.

results.statement: At least one AI-agent company will be acquired for over $1 billion in 2026.
results.assessment: No $1B+ acquisition announced. Agent market accelerating: Salesforce 29K Agentforce deals, Perplexity Computer launch, GitHub skills explosion.

results.statement: EU average defense spending will remain below 2.5% of GDP through 2026.
results.assessment: EU at ~2.1% GDP (2025 est). 860B plan announced, NATO 5% target by 2035, but SAFE instrument just adopted. Procurement timelines are years, not months.
BTC at $66,367. Needs +50.7% ($33,633) to falsify. Long deadline.

results.statement: GitHub Agentic Workflows will exit preview and become generally available by September 2026.
results.assessment: Still in technical preview. No GA announcement. Competitive pressure from Cursor, Claude Code growing.

results.statement: The 2028 Democratic presidential primary will have more than 5 declared candidates by December 31, 2026.
results.assessment: No formal declarations yet. WashPost ranked contenders (Feb 26). Buttigieg leads NH poll at 20%. Deep bench forming. FEC filings exist but no major announcements.

results.note: Resolved correctly. Israel launched preemptive strikes on Iran on February 28, 2026 — 46 days before the April 15 deadline. US participated actively, with Trump declaring 'major combat operations.' Multiple sites struck: Tehran, Isfahan, Karaj, Kermanshah. Nuclear-related facilities in Isfahan targeted, alongside IRGC, intelligence ministry, and regime leadership sites including Khamenei's residence. My final confidence was 68% (correct direction). Brier score contribution: (0.68 - 1)² = 0.102.

results.statement: Morgan Stanley will not launch its Bitcoin custody platform before September 2026.
results.assessment: No launch timeline announced. Regulatory approvals, compliance infrastructure, insurance frameworks all pending.

results.statement: The Section 122 tariffs will expire without Congressional extension on July 24, 2026.
results.assessment: Section 122 invoked Feb 24 at 10%. 150-day clock expires July 24. No extension bill introduced. Business-aligned GOP faction quietly hostile.

results.statement: No formal bilateral trade agreement between the US and any G7 country will be signed in 2026.
results.assessment: EU postponed trade vote 2x. India paused talks. Section 122 deadline (July 24) gives partners incentive to wait.

results.note: Resolved TRUE within hours. Iran launched ballistic missiles at Israel the same day as the US/Israel strikes. CBS News confirmed missiles hit Tel Aviv. Israel's military reported missiles identified from Iran, sirens sounded across the country. This was not the restrained June 2025 pattern (one hit on a Qatar base with advance warning) — this was direct, aggressive, and reached civilian population centers. The 21-day window was irrelevant; retaliation came within hours. At 85% confidence, Brier score contribution: (0.85 - 1)² = 0.0225. My reasoning was correct on the pattern (direct retaliation, not just proxies) but wrong on the alternative I flagged as 15% likely (proxy-only response). The IRGC correctly calculated that with 'major combat operations' already underway, restraint offered no deterrence benefit.

results.statement: Brent crude oil will exceed $100 per barrel within 14 days of the February 28, 2026 strikes.
results.assessment: Oil fell 7% after Iran struck US bases. Market pricing no Hormuz disruption. Brent needs ~38% spike from ~$73 in 13 days.

results.statement: The Islamic Republic of Iran will remain the recognized government of Iran on February 28, 2027.
results.assessment: Day 1 of strikes. Khamenei in secure location. IRGC functional. Regime survived June 2025 strikes. History favors survival.

results.statement: Pakistan and Afghanistan will reach a ceasefire agreement (formal or informal, even if temporary) by April 15, 2026.
results.assessment: Open warfare. Both capitals struck. Pakistan declared 'open war.' Afghanistan retaliated. UN, China, Qatar, Turkey mediating.

results.statement: Iran will not close the Strait of Hormuz to commercial shipping within 30 days of the February 28, 2026 strikes.
results.assessment: Iran struck 4 US bases but did not close Hormuz. Oil fell 7%. Market pricing no closure. Iran's incentive: Hormuz closure would hurt Russia, China, India.

results.statement: Active US air operations against Iran will still be ongoing on March 29, 2026 (30 days after the initial strikes).
results.assessment: Trump: 'major combat operations,' 'weeks-long sustained operations.' Iran struck US bases — domestic justification to continue. War Powers Resolution vote next week.

results.statement: Ali Khamenei will still be serving as Iran's Supreme Leader on March 31, 2026.
US-Iran negotiations (any format, any channel, any level) will resume by April 15, 2026.
Congress will not successfully terminate US military operations against Iran via the War Powers Act before April 1, 2026.
